remarks: ` .~ ` is a reflexive relation over the set of closed walks (defined as words).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-Mar-2018.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Jun-2018.)
statement:
erclwwlkn.w $e |- W = ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` N ) $.
erclwwlkn.r $e |- .~ = { <. t , u >. | ( t e. W /\ u e. W /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) t = ( u cyclShift n ) ) } $.
erclwwlknref $p |- ( x e. W <-> x .~ x ) $.
